articles.author: Rachel Chason, Erin Cox
articles.title: Maryland’s governor says Black residents don’t want to get vaccinated. But thousands are seeking shots. - The Washington Post
articles.description: Officials say Gov. Larry Hogan is distracting from the key reasons so few Black residents have been vaccinated.
